description: Triangle T(n,k), 1 <= k <= n, giving maximal size of code of length n and covering radius k over alphabet of size 4.
references: G. D. Cohen et al., Covering Codes, North-Holland, 1997, p. 174.
links: Index entries for sequences related to covering codes
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 07 2001
extensions: Next term, T(5,2), is in range 12-16.
